name: TECKpert
description:
TECKpert was founded in 2009 with the intent of helping businesses improve their online presence. What started as a one-man team developing websites for local Miami businesses expanded into the digital hub we are today, having created hundreds of websites and mobile apps thus far. Our team is diversely filled with expert web designers, app developers, marketers and everything in between.
We strive to make the web an easier and more efficient place for consumers to discover and interact with brands. This is why we don’t just do projects, we build businesses. It’s what generates long-term results and keeps us always striving for more.
